CF-1.4 2.9.1 NOAA Climate Data Record Program for satellites, FY 2011. Global Precipitation Climatology Project (GPCP) Monthly Version 2.3 gridded, merged satellite/gauge precipitation Climate Data Record (CDR) with errors from 1979 to present. George Huffman (george.j.huffman@nasa.gov) 2018-02-08T15:25:54Z mon 2018-02-08T15:25:54Z CMOR rewrote data to comply with CF standards and CMIP5 requirements.
